columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the subscription filter.

columns.name: log_group_name
columns.description: The name of the log group.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The creation time of the subscription filter.

columns.name: destination_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination.

columns.name: distribution
columns.description: The method used to distribute log data to the destination.

columns.name: filter_pattern
columns.description: A symbolic description of how CloudWatch Logs should interpret the data in each log event.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The role associated to the filter.
